concept.description: Labels all fields or methods annotated by @javax.inject.Inject with "Cdi" and "InjectionPoint".
concept.cypher: match (:Type)-[:DECLARES]->(member), (member)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(injectType:Type) where (member:Field or member:Method) and injectType.fqn="javax.inject.Inject" set member:Cdi:InjectionPoint return count(member) as InjectionPoints

concept.description: Labels all fields or methods annotated by @javax.enterprise.inject.Produces with "Cdi" and "Produces".
concept.cypher: match (:Type)-[:DECLARES]->(member), (member)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(producesType:Type) where (member:Field or member:Method) and producesType.fqn="javax.enterprise.inject.Produces" set member:Cdi:Produces return count(member) as Producer

concept.description: Labels all annotation types annotated by @javax.inject.Qualifier with "Cdi" and "Qualifier".

concept.description: Labels all annotation types annotated by @javax.inject.Qualifier with "Cdi" and "Qualifier" and adds the labels "Cdi" and "Nonbinding" to all non-binding annotation values (i.e. which are annotated by @javax.enterprise.util.Nonbinding).
concept.cypher: match (qualifier:Type)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(qualifierType:Type) where qualifierType.fqn = "javax.inject.Qualifier" set qualifier:Cdi:Qualifier with qualifier match (qualifier)-[:DECLARES]->(attribute:Method), (attribute)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(nonbindingType:Type) where nonbindingType.fqn = "javax.enterprise.util.Nonbinding" set attribute:Cdi:Nonbinding return count(distinct qualifier) as Qualifiers

concept.description: Labels all beans declaring "InjectionPoint" of type "javax.enterprise.event.Event" with "Cdi" and "EventProducer".
concept.cypher: MATCH (a:Type)-[:DECLARES]->(member:Field:Cdi:InjectionPoint)-[:OF_TYPE]->(injectType:Type) WHERE injectType.fqn = "javax.enterprise.event.Event" SET a:Cdi:EventProducer RETURN count(distinct a.fqn) AS CdiEventProducers

concept.description: Labels all beans declaring method that has parameter of type "javax.enterprise.event.Observes" with "Cdi" and "EventConsumer".
concept.cypher: MATCH (a:Type)-[:DECLARES]->(member:Method)-[:HAS]->(p:Parameter)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(injectType:Type) WHERE injectType.fqn = "javax.enterprise.event.Observes" SET a:Cdi:EventConsumer RETURN count(distinct a.fqn) AS CdiEventConsumers
